unit.utterance: Film avalaš bā sedāye xorus darvāqe šoru šod
unit.utterance_translation: the movie begins with the sound of a rooster

unit.utterance: nazare xodamam begam? Faqat tozih bedam?
unit.utterance_translation: Should I say my opinion or just explain the film?

unit.utterance: Bā sedāye xorus šoru šod film
unit.utterance_translation: it started with the sound of rooster

unit.utterance: badaš yek bāqbāni rā nešān dād ke yek kolāhe bozorgi saraš bud yek dastmāl gardane qermez dore gardenaš bud ke dar hāle čidane golābi bud in bāqbān
unit.utterance_translation: then we saw a gardner who has a big hat on his head, and a red scarf around his neck, he was picking the pears

unit.utterance: bad ke golābihā rā čid
unit.utterance_translation: after picking the pears

unit.utterance: yani ba yek hālate ešqe xeyli xubi bā golābihāyaš dar vaqe bā yek hālate xub golābihāyaš rā tamiz kard dobāre gozāšt tuye sabadaš
unit.utterance_translation: he cleans the pears with lots of joy and interest, and put them in the basket

unit.utterance: bad dobāre az nardebān raft bālā šoru kard be čidane mojadade darvāqe golābihā
unit.utterance_translation: again he climbed up the tree and started picking the pears again

unit.utterance: ke mičid mirixt tuye dāmanaš va bad dobāre miyāmad pāyin
unit.utterance_translation: he was picking them, keeping them in his clothes and them coming down to put them in the basket

unit.utterance: va dobāre mirixt tuye sabadhāyaš
unit.utterance_translation: and again he was putting them in the basket

unit.utterance: albate tuye paszamineye film yek čizi ham nešān dād ke sedāye boz miyāmad darvāqe
unit.utterance_translation: but in the background we heard the sound of a goat

unit.utterance: ke yek kešāvarzi hālā nemidānam ya yek kasi tuye zamine āmad bā bozaš az kenāre golābihā rad šod
unit.utterance_translation: a farmer with a goat came by and passed the baskets

unit.utterance: bad yek bačeyi rā nešān dād ke az dur darvāqe , jāleb bud ke bā yek lebāse moštarak bā xode bāqbān bud bačehe
unit.utterance_translation: then we saw a little boy who has almost the same clothes as the gardner

unit.utterance: ke yek kolāhi dāšt bāz yek dastmāl gardane qermezi dore gardenaš bud
unit.utterance_translation: he was also wearing a hat and a red scarf around his neck

unit.utterance: savāre dočarxe āmad rad mišod avalaš xāst yek dāne golābi bardārad az tuye sabad
unit.utterance_translation: he came on a bike, and wanted to take one pear

unit.utterance: bad be fekraš resid ke bahbah mitavānad hameye sabad rā dāšte bāšad čon bāqbān ruye deraxt ast dastaš beheš nemiresad
unit.utterance_translation: but since the gardner was on the tree he changed his mind and decided to take the whole basket

unit.utterance: bad sabad rā bardāšt gozāšt ruye dočarxeaš
unit.utterance_translation: he took the basket and put it on his bike

unit.utterance: ke dočarxeaš bozorgtar az xodaš bud yek zare nāmoteādel bud
unit.utterance_translation: and the bike was much bigger than the boy

unit.utterance: nešast ruye dočarxe ke hālā bā har zahmati ke bud sabad rā gozāšt ruye dočarxeaš va pedal zad šoru kard be harkat kardan
unit.utterance_translation: he put the basket on the bike and rode away

unit.utterance: bad hālā tuye in zamine az ruberuyaš dar vāqe yek doxtari bā yek dočarxeye digari dāšt miyāmad ke hālā šayad mahve zibayiaš šod yā hālā bače bud nemidānam če šekli
unit.utterance_translation: at the same time right in the opposite direction there came a girl on a bike, I think the boy got distracted by her beauty or maybe she was just a kid, I have no idea.

unit.utterance: ke mahve u šod ke kolāhaš darvāqe gereft be doxtare ke dāšt rad mišod hālate bāde darvāqe dočarxeye ruberuyi gereft be kolāhe in kolāhaš oftād havāsaš raft be kolāhaš
unit.utterance_translation: he got distracted and the hat was taken off and he tried to capture the it

unit.utterance: xord zamin golābihāyaš rixt albate xob tuye pas zamineye film xeyli durbin zoom karde bud ruye golābihā manovr midād, ruye sabad, golābi, golābi ke oftād ruye zamin
unit.utterance_translation: he fell down, the pears spilled out

unit.utterance: bad dige pesare boland šod pāyaš dard mikard šoru kard lebāshāyaš rā tekāndan
unit.utterance_translation: the boy got up and his foot was aching, he tried to dust his clothes

unit.utterance: yek zarre darvāqe pāyaš rā nāz kardan va inke dard dārad
unit.utterance_translation: he had pain

unit.utterance: bad se tā bače rā nešun dād ke az dur istāde budand in rā negāh mikardand āmadand nazdik beheš komak kardand
unit.utterance_translation: then we saw three boys who were standing a bit farther and looking at him, they approached to help him

unit.utterance: ke golābihā rā jam kard ye kodām az in pesarhā, yek sahnei ke bištar hālate lāte mahal rā nešān midahad ke sut mizanand harkat mikonand miāyand jolo, yek hamčin hālati bud šāyad
unit.utterance_translation: they helped him to gather up the pears

unit.utterance: vali komak kardand be pesrare golābihāyaš rā jam kard tuye sabad gozāšt
unit.utterance_translation: they helped the little boy to gather the pears and put them back into the basket

unit.utterance: bad bā rāketaš bāzi mikard pesare yek raketi dāšt ke modām yani sedāye ān tup engār ke masalan yek musiqie matni bāšad hey tup rā ruye rāket bāzi midād
unit.utterance_translation: the boy was playing with a tennis racket, the sound of the ball on the racket could be heard in the background

unit.utterance: ke bad komak kard ke dobāre sabad rā bogzārad in pesare dobāre bargašt ke sabade por az golābi rā bogzārad ruye dočarxe va harkat konad
unit.utterance_translation: they helped him, the boy came back to put the basket on his bike and leave

unit.utterance: bad se tā golābi darvāqe mesle dastmozd yā hālā tašakor az inke in kārhā rā kardand golābihā rā bardāštand
unit.utterance_translation: he gave them three pears to thank them, and they accepted them

unit.utterance: va dar hāle xordan bargaštand va pesare raft
unit.utterance_translation: and the boy went away

unit.utterance: va inhā ham bargaštand va darvāqe bāqbān āmad pāyin
unit.utterance_translation: they left and the gardner came down the tree

unit.utterance: šoru kard negāh kardan did yeki az sabadhāyaš kam ast
unit.utterance_translation: he took a look at his baskets and found out one of them was gone

unit.utterance: bad hālā durbin nešān midād ke golābihā rā bāqbān dar daste inhā darad mibinad ke inhā bā hālate xordan dārand mixorand va rad mišavand
unit.utterance_translation: then we saw that the gardner noticed the pears in boys' hands while they were eating and passing

unit.utterance: va kāri ham xob az dastaš šāyad barnemiyāmad digar sabade golābie u bud rad šodand va raftand.
unit.utterance_translation: he couldn't actually do anything and the boys left
